name: The Call Of Paper Plane
description:
Starting from the city, living in the dream of a paper plane, yearning for an unexplored trip, the front is winding and verdant.

Avoid obstacles on the road, enjoy the scenery along the way, and listen to the ensemble of birds and flowers to one stop after another.

Gameplay

Players will turn into paper planes to fly over the mountains, rivers, lakes, and seas to complete the journey again and again, and try to use different skills to avoid various obstacles on the way.

Style

The game is a pencil drawing style, and each beautiful scene is equipped with an album. Complete the trip to unlock the content and rewards in the album.

Immersive music

The objects in the scene have their soundtrack, and the sound can be heard when flying close.
